name: Electrophysiological Dataset of Local Neuronal Microcircuits in the Primate Anterior Insular Cortex
citation: Jing, Junzhan (2026) Electrophysiological Dataset of Local Neuronal Microcircuits in the Primate Anterior Insular Cortex (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001751/draft
description: The dataset contains the intracellular recordings from Macaque Anterior Insular Cortex neurons. We used simutaneous multiple patch-clamp recording to collecte the neuronal connectivity data of anterior insular cortex neurons in crab-eating monkeys.
studyTarget: We simutaneously recorded multiple neurons in monkey AIC to investigate the connection differences of VEN and PCs.
We found VEN has sparse connections with their neiboring neurons compared to PCs.
acknowledgement: This work was supported by  Natural Science Foundation of China.

relatedResource.name: Cell Atlas and Novel Signal Processing Strategy in Primate Insular Cortex
